channel.title: SomeCndnSkeptic on More than Men
channel.description: Recent content in SomeCndnSkeptic on More than Men

item.title: Steve Thoms The Diversity Division
item.description: ‘Diversity’ is one of those words that people can get tired of hearing very quickly: it makes them feel guilty and insensitive, and it almost always raises acrimonious discussion until it fizzles out, leaving bitter emotions in its wake. A quick perusal of comment threads (such as here , here , and here ) might lead one to think that there is a small number of privileged minorities who have nothing better to do then to complain, insult, and derail conversations towards their pet project: complaining about a problem that was solved years ago.
